amendment.description: Amendment sought to require independent valuation of the land prior to any restrictions being removed for the years 1776, 1865, 2013, 2017, 2032, and 2212.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in the Congressional Record to require independent valuation of the land prior to any restrictions being removed. The amendment requires valuations of the land for the years 1776, 1865, 2013, 2017, 2032, and 2212.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A002) offered by Mr. Hastings (FL).
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings (FL) amendment (A002) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
